room_title: Escape room "The Emperor's Stone" by Escape Joplin in Joplin
room_description: You are a group of detectives selected by the Chinese Emperor’s Counsel for an undercover mission. Since the raid of the Summer Palace in 1860, China has never been the same. The most sacred national treasure–a jade guardian lion believed to bring good luck–had been stolen. Armed only with classified documents about your top-secret mission, you have sixty minutes to retrieve the jade lion from the Art Museum director’s office, escape undetected, and restore China’s good fortune.
